scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第33集:谈判联手·两族联手。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君传音讥讽寰姓少年,说这头老鼠一直躲在鼠巢中度大天劫,从不肯外出。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord transmits voice mocking Huan youth, says this rat always hides in nest for great tribulation, never goes out

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord transmits voice mocking Huan youth, says this rat always hides in nest for great tribulation, never goes out.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君传音讥讽寰姓少年,说这头老鼠一直躲在鼠巢中度大天劫。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年传音回答,说若真有把握度过三千年一次的大天劫,又怎会有闲心出现在这里。

visual.composition: Huan youth transmits voice answering, says if really confident about passing great tribulation every three thousand years, why come here

scenes.prompt: Huan youth transmits voice answering, says if really confident about passing great tribulation every three thousand years, why come here.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年传音回答,说若真有把握度过大天劫,又怎会出现在这里。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年长叹,说在炼虚初期徘徊了万余年,没有丝毫把握再度过下次,不如出来寻机缘。

visual.composition: Huan youth sighs, says stuck at early Void Refinement for over ten thousand years, no confidence for next, better seek opportunities

scenes.prompt: Huan youth sighs, says stuck at early Void Refinement for over ten thousand years, no confidence for next, better seek opportunities.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年长叹,说在炼虚初期徘徊万余年,没有把握再度过下次。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年说原本想邀请黄粱灵君再闯一次蛮荒,恰好碰到灵族的事情,自然插手一二。

visual.composition: Huan youth says originally wanted to invite Huangliang Spirit Lord to explore wilderness again, encountered spirit clan matter, naturally intervened

scenes.prompt: Huan youth says originally wanted to invite Huangliang Spirit Lord to explore wilderness again, encountered spirit clan matter, naturally intervened.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年说原本想邀请黄粱灵君再闯蛮荒,恰好碰到灵族事情插手。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年说虽然人妖有别,但神通互补,联手在蛮荒中可安全得多,数千年前就联手过。

visual.composition: Huan youth says though human and demon differ, abilities complement, joining forces in wilderness much safer, joined thousands of years ago

scenes.prompt: Huan youth says though human and demon differ, abilities complement, joining forces in wilderness much safer, joined thousands of years ago.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年说虽人妖有别,但神通互补,联手在蛮荒中可安全得多。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年说黄粱灵君的第二次大天劫也快到了,若不趁早找度劫宝物,不知有多少把握度过。

visual.composition: Huan youth says Huangliang Spirit Lord's second great tribulation coming soon, if not find tribulation treasures early, unsure how much chance

scenes.prompt: Huan youth says Huangliang Spirit Lord's second great tribulation coming soon, if not find tribulation treasures early, unsure how much chance.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年说黄粱灵君第二次大天劫快到,若不趁早找度劫宝物,不知多少把握。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君坦言第二次大劫只有一半把握度过,上一次度劫时毁掉了不少宝物。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord honestly says second great tribulation only half chance, last time destroyed many treasures

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord honestly says second great tribulation only half chance, last time destroyed many treasures.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君坦言第二次大劫只有一半把握度过,上次度劫毁掉不少宝物。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年肃然传音正式邀请,说是否愿意和他再去蛮荒世界走上一趟。

visual.composition: Huan youth seriously transmits formal invitation, asks if willing to go to wilderness world again with him

scenes.prompt: Huan youth seriously transmits formal invitation, asks if willing to go to wilderness world again with him.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年肃然传音正式邀请,说是否愿意和他再去蛮荒世界走一趟。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君脸色阴晴不定,眉头紧皱询问,既然打算联手去蛮荒,此地灵族之事如何解决。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord face changing, frowns and asks, since planning to join forces for wilderness, how to resolve spirit clan matter here

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord face changing, frowns and asks, since planning to join forces for wilderness, how to resolve spirit clan matter here.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君脸色阴晴不定,询问既然打算联手去蛮荒,此地灵族之事如何解决。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年毫不迟疑说道,你我双方联手先将这些灵族擒下,抓到灵族叛逆再说。

visual.composition: Huan youth without hesitation says, our two sides join forces to capture these spirits first, catch spirit traitor first

scenes.prompt: Huan youth without hesitation says, our two sides join forces to capture these spirits first, catch spirit traitor first.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年毫不迟疑说道,你我双方联手先将这些灵族擒下,抓到叛逆再说。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年说叛逆身上的东西,若数目多则两族平分,若只有一件则切磋神通,胜者拿走。

visual.composition: Huan youth says traitor's things, if many then split, if only one then compete, winner takes

scenes.prompt: Huan youth says traitor's things, if many then split, if only one then compete, winner takes.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年说叛逆身上的东西,若多则两族平分,若只有一件则切磋神通。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君毫不犹豫摇头,说寰姓少年比他早进入炼虚期数千年,他不可能占上风。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord shakes head without hesitation, says Huan youth entered Void Refinement thousands of years earlier, cannot win

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord shakes head without hesitation, says Huan youth entered Void Refinement thousands of years earlier, cannot win.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君毫不犹豫摇头,说寰姓少年比他早进炼虚期数千年,他不可能占上风。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君一捻胡须说道,到时看看到底是何物再说,另一方必须付出差不多的代价。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord strokes beard, says see what it is first, other side must pay equivalent price

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord strokes beard, says see what it is first, other side must pay equivalent price.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君一捻胡须说道,到时看看到底是何物再说,另一方须付代价。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年面上厉色一闪,暗中提议道,没问题就以道友之言,你我两族动手先解决灵族。

visual.composition: Huan youth's face flashes with fierceness, secretly proposes, no problem as you say, our two races act to solve spirits first

scenes.prompt: Huan youth's face flashes with fierceness, secretly proposes, no problem as you say, our two races act to solve spirits first.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年面上厉色一闪,暗中提议道,没问题就以道友之言,两族动手先解决灵族。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君点点头,说好,你我就如说定了,随即转首向蓝城主等人传音解释几句。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord nods, says good, agreed, then turns to City Lord Lan and others, transmits explanation

scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君点头说好,你我就如说定了,随即转首向蓝城主等人传音解释。

scenes.description: 其他人见坐收渔利的打算被揭穿,妖族也出现了炼虚期妖修,自然只能无奈同意。

visual.composition: Others see fishing for benefit plan exposed, demon race also has Void Refinement demon cultivator, naturally reluctantly agree

scenes.narration: 其他人见坐收渔利打算被揭穿,妖族也有炼虚期妖修,只能无奈同意。

scenes.description: 蓝城主二话不说两手一搓一扬,一颗蓝灿灿的巨大火球冲天而起,在高空爆裂。

visual.composition: City Lord Lan without hesitation rubs hands together and raises, blue glowing giant fireball shoots up, explodes in sky

scenes.description: 远处山头树林中各色光芒闪动,一道道遁光飞射而出,人类修士和炼体士纷纷现身。

visual.composition: Distant hills and forests glow with various lights, beams of light shoot out, human cultivators and body cultivators appear

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君大声吩咐,人族这面都知道了两族要联手先对付灵族的事情,虽然略感惊讶但未反对。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord loudly commands, human side all know two races will join forces against spirits, slightly surprised but not opposed

scenes.description: 那边妖气翻滚,大群相貌狰狞的妖兽和十几名化形妖修,先后现身而出。

visual.composition: Over there demon qi rolls, large groups of fierce beasts and over ten transformed demon cultivators appear one after another

scenes.description: 人类这边各种法宝灵具纷纷被祭出,灵气冲天,化为片片光霞,气势惊人。

visual.composition: Human side various magic treasures and artifacts all activated, spiritual qi soaring, turning into light clouds, impressive momentum

scenes.description: 对面的绿裙女子和黄石公见寰姓少年和黄粱灵君窃窃私语时,就大感不妙。

visual.composition: Opposite green-dressed woman and Huang Shigong see Huan youth and Huangliang Spirit Lord whispering, feel very bad

scenes.description: 二人脸色阴霾互望一眼,忽然二话不说的往回就走,身后的木鸟和石巨人也飞快撤去。

visual.composition: Two people look at each other with dark faces, suddenly turn back without a word, wooden birds and stone giants behind also quickly withdraw

scenes.prompt: Two people look at each other with dark faces, suddenly turn back without a word, wooden birds and stone giants behind also quickly withdraw.
scenes.narration: 二人脸色阴霾互望一眼,忽然二话不说往回就走,身后傀儡也飞快撤去。

scenes.description: 灵族竟然不战而退,人妖两族之人自然均都一怔,马上认为灵族准备逃走。

visual.composition: Spirit race actually retreats without fighting, human and demon races all stunned, immediately think spirits preparing to flee

scenes.prompt: Spirit race actually retreats without fighting, human and demon races all stunned, immediately think spirits preparing to flee.

scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第34集即将开始。
